title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.9 - Severability

State Regulations

In the event any part, section, subdivision or paragraph
of this subchapter shall be declared or adjudged invalid or unconstitutional, such adjudication shall in no manner affect the other parts, sections, subdivisions or paragraphs of this subchapter, which shall remain in force and
effect as if the part, section, subdivision or paragraph so declared or
adjudged invalid or unconstitutional were not originally part
hereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7900.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
